e1e8b63b-2353-44f8-8210-667d0277f3fc.name: Combat Reflexes
e1e8b63b-2353-44f8-8210-667d0277f3fc.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

39b811a2-a896-4c44-8e24-64e54e0930f8.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

afaecf02-dfdc-427c-a6fe-91957ef20632.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

2549748d-2bf7-4776-bb71-6e4ba3517696.name: Legal Enforcement Powers (@Federal or Secret Service@)

03399f7c-3c01-43b5-8f76-6062cdb23081.name: Wise Master
03399f7c-3c01-43b5-8f76-6062cdb23081.notes: Choose 20 points. You can add your template's IQ-, Will-, or Per-based skills.

aa9d52fe-bc51-43cc-88d3-f1d405e5b333.name: Luck, Extraordinary
aa9d52fe-bc51-43cc-88d3-f1d405e5b333.notes: Usable once per 30 minutes of play

8c421dd4-f147-4560-b212-a0ad1440a28c.name: Easy to Hit
8c421dd4-f147-4560-b212-a0ad1440a28c.notes: Others can target your eyes at only -6 to hit

a55a8ff8-f897-4c5f-9701-290014262709.name: Signature Gear
a55a8ff8-f897-4c5f-9701-290014262709.notes: Gear is worth (starting wealth)/10 per level

52fdf9a1-0148-4943-a967-d5ab0d5a96da.name: Luck
52fdf9a1-0148-4943-a967-d5ab0d5a96da.notes: Usable once per hour of play

4c6b2cb7-b732-473c-b193-62707e93f99d.name: Weapon Bond (@Starting Weapon@)
4c6b2cb7-b732-473c-b193-62707e93f99d.notes: You own a Weapon that is uniquely suited to you.

9c0116c7-5cde-40f1-897b-5f60879e1d4e.name: Intolerance (@Rival nation or other large group@)

3cf198b7-23ad-4d9f-9501-02cbcf37bb51.name: "Guns are no match for my favorite weapon!"

06bca447-7849-4fba-a073-e6fc69dd40f4.name: Martial Arts Perks
06bca447-7849-4fba-a073-e6fc69dd40f4.notes: Distribute 15 points between these and Martial Arts Skills.

2434a5e5-07c0-454d-bdab-d8b410870f22.name: Deadly Pose
2434a5e5-07c0-454d-bdab-d8b410870f22.notes: Free Intimidation attempt upon takedown. -5 in combat. +2 for knockout. +5 for fatality.

3eedeb12-e50c-4bad-9d6b-1e277affd3d0.name: Finishing Move (@Attack@)
3eedeb12-e50c-4bad-9d6b-1e277affd3d0.notes: +1 per die of damage, but only upon disabled foes.

70d2b20c-d2cd-4a63-bed7-8bd9925df038.name: Focused Fury
70d2b20c-d2cd-4a63-bed7-8bd9925df038.notes: Combine Mighty Blows and All Out Attack

d6eb47bd-acd1-476c-816e-7f6ab3d8c43f.name: Off-Hand Weapon Training (@Weapon@)
d6eb47bd-acd1-476c-816e-7f6ab3d8c43f.notes: Replaces equal-named technique on p. B232

504606f1-f06e-41fc-8414-d61fcebddbf5.name: Trademark Move
504606f1-f06e-41fc-8414-d61fcebddbf5.notes: +1 to @One turn of detailed combat actions@

39de5761-1337-4ddc-910e-cba077d9864b.name: Urban Jungle Gym
39de5761-1337-4ddc-910e-cba077d9864b.notes: When not in combat, "urban" obstacles require no skill rolls and have no effect on Move.

f682d42c-f3cb-4878-a63a-97bbb3c66226.name: Weapon Bond (@Weapon@)
f682d42c-f3cb-4878-a63a-97bbb3c66226.notes: You own a Weapon that is uniquely suited to you.

8e04bb59-3384-4453-905c-792750f8d9bb.name: Choose 18 points
8e04bb59-3384-4453-905c-792750f8d9bb.notes: Either two or six points may be used to level-up one of these skills.

1e8056b8-5cbd-4a6b-9276-130b04e9d57d.name: Intelligence
1e8056b8-5cbd-4a6b-9276-130b04e9d57d.notes: Choose 20 points. Either two or six of these points may be used to raise one of these skills by one or two levels.

9ddbc7f7-83c7-4e8c-b8c0-75860701b654.name: Choose 16 points
9ddbc7f7-83c7-4e8c-b8c0-75860701b654.notes: Either two or six of those points may be used to increase one of these skills by one or two levels.

029167d4-373c-46f1-ae06-a78aa37748ac.name: Choose 18 points
029167d4-373c-46f1-ae06-a78aa37748ac.notes: Either two or six of these points may be used to raise one of these skills by one or two levels.

b02f325d-b5ac-405b-b148-b0b0b3dc3b32.name: Security
b02f325d-b5ac-405b-b148-b0b0b3dc3b32.notes: Choose 20 points. Either two or six of these points may be used to raise one of these skills by one or two levels.

67feaaf7-e34d-4d93-87ae-ea9c7c1ef81b.name: Wise Master
67feaaf7-e34d-4d93-87ae-ea9c7c1ef81b.notes: 20 points in your template's IQ-, Will-, or Per-based skills.

c012aada-e38e-4c96-9421-2a122388f9b1.name: Martial Arts Skills
c012aada-e38e-4c96-9421-2a122388f9b1.notes: Distribute 15 points between these and Martial Arts Perks.

025f7133-8a79-45b4-b514-23c9d7e4ce38.name: Primary
025f7133-8a79-45b4-b514-23c9d7e4ce38.notes: Choose 16 points. Maximum of 12 points in any one skill.

0f27a398-dc74-4d28-a6ae-41a1547d3890.name: Choose five
0f27a398-dc74-4d28-a6ae-41a1547d3890.notes: Or four, and raise one of these, an unarmed combat skill, Acrobatics, or Stealth by a level.

b2634b80-9e05-4999-8bc8-c65c13d69256.name: Judo
b2634b80-9e05-4999-8bc8-c65c13d69256.notes: Allows parrying two different attacks per turn, one with each hand.
